attributes.action: help set up places where young rape victims can go and talk about what happned to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being a Rape victim myself,i wanted to set up a place where young girls or boys can go and talk about what has happned to them,without feeling pressured.i feel that there is nobody i can talk to,because they have never experienced what i have.If i had a choice of a place like this i would be able to share my tragedy and the other victims will understand, i think most Victms would be happy with this.
please would you help me pursue my dream.
carly stickels
Age:16
